content:
What a fantastic idea! I didn't think of including solo work from other Beatles members, but that's a great way to keep the Beatles connection going while exploring other decades. "Got My Mind Set on You" and "Private Property" are both great additions to the playlist. My parents will love those!

And, absolutely, let's bring on the 1990s! That decade was a game-changer for music, with the rise of alternative rock, grunge, and pop. I think it's a great way to bridge the gap between my parents' favorite decades and my own musical tastes.

Please, do share some must-have 1990s tracks! I'm excited to hear your suggestions. Some genres and artists I'm interested in exploring include:

* Alternative rock: Foo Fighters, Radiohead, Smashing Pumpkins
* Grunge: Nirvana, Pearl Jam, Soundgarden
* Pop: Spice Girls, Backstreet Boys, Britney Spears
* Hip-Hop/R&B: Tupac Shakur, The Notorious B.I.G., Mariah Carey

Go ahead and suggest some essential 1990s tracks that will get everyone singing along and dancing in their seats!
